data.eml:eml: Two new species of Pirhosigma Giordani Soika (Vespidae, Eumeninae), with an updated catalog for the genus

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ferreira, Wellington D., Hermes, Marcel G., Garcete-Barrett, Bolivar R., James M. Carpenter, (2019): Two new species of Pirhosigma Giordani Soika (Vespidae, Eumeninae), with an updated catalog for the genus. Journal of Hymenoptera Research 71: 225-240, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/jhr.71.35754, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/jhr.71.35754
